[File: stacks-core/stacks-node/src/run_loop/nakamoto.rs] [Struct: RunLoop] [State Lifecycle] The RunLoop has fields marked as 'not known until .start() is called' (is_miner, burnchain) - if any code path tries to access these via getters before start(), the expects will panic. Can this be exploited to DoS nodes during initialization? (Medium)
